verses.verse: And <WG2532> I<WG1473>, brethren<WG80>, could<WG1410> not<WG3756> speak<WG2980> unto you<WG5213> as<WG5613> unto spiritual<WG4152>, but<WG235> as<WG5613> unto carnal<WG4559>, as<WG5613> unto babes<WG3516> in<WG1722> Christ<WG5547>.

I fed<WG4222> you<WG5209> with milk<WG1051>, <WG2532> not<WG3756> with meat<WG1033>; for1063, 3768 ye were not yet able<WG1410> to bear it<WG235>: nay<WG3777>, not even<WG2089> now<WG3568> are ye able<WG1410>;

for <WG1063> ye are<WG2075> yet<WG2089> carnal<WG4559>: for<WG1063> whereas<WG3699> there is among<WG1722> you<WG5213> jealousy<WG2205> and<WG2532> strife<WG2054>, are ye<WG2075> not<WG3780> carnal<WG4559>, and<WG2532> do ye not walk<WG4043> after the manner<WG2596> of men<WG444>?
For <WG1063> when<WG3752> one<WG5100> saith<WG3004>, I1473, Ezekiel3 am<WG1510> of Paul<WG3972>; and<WG1161> another<WG2087>, I<WG1473> am of Apollos<WG625>; are ye<WG2075> not<WG3780> men<WG4559>?

What <WG5101> then<WG3767> is<WG2076> Apollos<WG625>? and<WG1161> what<WG5101> is Paul<WG3972>? 235, 2228 Ministers<WG1249> through<WG1223> whom<WG5101> ye believed<WG4100>; and<WG2532> each as<WG5613> the Lord<WG2962> gave to<WG1325> him<WG1538>.
I planted<WG5452>, Apollos<WG625> watered<WG4222>; but<WG235> God<WG2316> gave the increase<WG837>.
So then<WG5620> neither<WG3777> is he<WG2076> that planteth<WG5452> anything<WG5100>, neither<WG3777> he that watereth<WG4222>; but<WG235> God<WG2316> that giveth the increase<WG837>.

Now <WG1161> he that<WG3588> planteth<WG5452> and<WG2532> he that<WG3588> watereth<WG4222> are<WG1526> one<WG1520>: but<WG1161> each<WG1520> shall receive<WG2983> his own<WG2398> reward<WG3408> according to<WG2596> his own<WG2398> labor<WG2873>.
For <WG1063> we are<WG2070> God<WG2316>'s fellow-workers<WG4904>: ye are<WG2075> God<WG2316>'s husbandry<WG1091>, God<WG2316>'s building<WG3619>.

According to<WG2596> the grace<WG5485> of God<WG2316> which<WG3588> was given<WG1325> unto me<WG3427>, as<WG5613> a wise<WG4680> masterbuilder<WG753> I laid<WG5087> a foundation<WG2310>; and<WG1161> another<WG243> buildeth thereon<WG2026>. But<WG1161> let<WG991> each man<WG1538> take heed<WG991> how<WG4459> he buildeth thereon<WG2026>.
For <WG1063> other<WG243> foundation<WG2310> can<WG1410> no man<WG3762> lay<WG5087> than<WG3844> that which is laid<WG2749>, which<WG3739> is<WG2076> Jesus<WG2424> Christ<WG5547>.

But <WG1161> if<WG1487> any man<WG5100> buildeth<WG2026> on<WG1909> the<WG5126> foundation<WG2310> gold<WG5557>, silver<WG696>, costly<WG5093> stones<WG3037>, wood<WG3586>, hay<WG5528>, stubble<WG2562>;

each man<WG1538>'s work<WG2041> shall be made<WG1096> manifest<WG5318>: for<WG1063> the day<WG2250> shall declare it<WG1213>, because<WG3754> it is revealed<WG601> in<WG1722> fire<WG4442>; and<WG2532> the fire<WG4442> itself shall prove<WG1381> each man<WG1538>'s work<WG2041> of what sort<WG3697> it is<WG2076>.
If <WG1487> any man<WG5100>'s work<WG2041> shall abide<WG3306> which<WG3739> he built thereon<WG2026>, he shall receive<WG2983> a reward<WG3306>.

If <WG1487> any man<WG5100>'s work<WG2041> shall be burned<WG2618>, he shall suffer loss<WG2210>: but<WG1161> he himself<WG846> shall be saved<WG4982>; yet<WG1161> so<WG3779> as<WG5613> through<WG1223> fire<WG4442>.
Know ye<WG1492> not<WG3756> that<WG3754> ye are<WG2075> a temple<WG3485> of God<WG2316>, and<WG2532> that the Spirit<WG4151> of God<WG2316> dwelleth<WG3611> in<WG1722> you<WG5213>?

If <WG1487> any man<WG5100> destroyeth<WG5351> the temple<WG3485> of God<WG2316>, him<WG5126> shall<WG5351> God<WG2316> destroy<WG5351>; for<WG1063> the temple<WG3485> of God<WG2316> is<WG2076> holy<WG40>, and such<WG3748> are<WG2075> ye<WG5210>.

Let <WG1818> no man<WG3367> deceive<WG1818> himself<WG1438>. If<WG1487> any man<WG5100> thinketh<WG1380> that he is<WG1511> wise<WG4680> among<WG1722> you<WG5213> in<WG1722> this<WG5129> world<WG165>, let him become<WG1096> a fool<WG3474>, that<WG2443> he may become<WG1096> wise<WG4680>.

For <WG1063> the wisdom<WG4678> of this<WG5127> world<WG2889> is<WG2076> foolishness<WG3472> with<WG3844> God<WG2316>. For<WG1063> it is written<WG1125>, He that taketh<WG1405> the wise<WG4680> in<WG1722> their craftiness<WG3834>:
and <WG2532> again<WG3825>, The Lord<WG2962> knoweth<WG1097> the reasonings<WG3152> of the wise<WG4680> that<WG3754> they are<WG1526> vain<WG3152>.
Wherefore <WG5620> let<WG2744> no one<WG3367> glory<WG2744> in<WG1722> men<WG444>. For<WG1063> all things<WG3956> are<WG2076> yours<WG5216>;

whether <WG1535> Paul<WG3972>, or<WG1535> Apollos<WG625>, or<WG1535> Cephas<WG2786>, or<WG1535> the world<WG2889>, or<WG1535> life<WG2222>, or<WG1535> death<WG2288>, or<WG1535> things present<WG1764>, or<WG1535> things to come<WG3195>; all<WG3956> are<WG2076> yours<WG5216>;
and <WG1161> ye<WG5210> are Christ<WG5547>'s; and<WG1161> Christ<WG5547> is God<WG2316>'s.
